column3: NACK, please use https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/ for updating translations. We won't merge language updates via pull-requests, sorry.\n
yes, please upload this to transifex and it will be included automatically\n
Ah OK, no problem, I'll upload it there instead. Thanks for your swift replies.\n

I'm not an expert in Transifex â€” I've just uploaded my file there as requested, but I'd be grateful if you could have a quick look there and confirm to me that everything seems to be in order to have the new localisation included in the next version. (And roughly how long is the wait for that to happen?) Thanks in advance.\nhttps://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/\n
